name: Gor Rubenyan
bio: I specialize in building high-quality web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Redux Toolkit, Next.js, Vite and Tailwind CSS. I create modern, responsive, and user-centric interfaces that deliver exceptional digital experiences.
aboutText: I am a web developer with over 3 years of experience in frontend development, specializing in React, Next.js, and modern web technologies. I am passionate about creating intuitive and visually appealing user experiences.
aboutText2: My journey in web development began with a curiosity about the inner workings of websites, which eventually led me to a career dedicated to crafting digital solutions that have a meaningful impact. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and staying current with the latest industry trends.
projectsPortfolio: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, featuring dark mode, multilingual support, and smooth animations.
projectsTask: A comprehensive task management application with real-time updates, user authentication, and intuitive drag-and-drop functionality.
projectsEcommerce: A fully integrated e-commerce platform with payment processing, inventory management, and an advanced shopping cart functionality.
workText: Developed and maintained modern web interfaces using React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality web applications, improving user experience metrics by 40%.
contactText: I am always open to new opportunities and interesting projects. Feel free to reach out if you would like to collaborate or simply say hello.
